requirements.description: Disciple of a faith OTHER than Chaos, Death, Destruction, Evil, Fire, or Storm.

text: You can supervise the healing process of a resting creature by sitting by their side, chanting this prayer in a rosary-like way.
While this happens, they gain a +1 divine bonus to their natural hourly health regeneration.
While praying in this manner, you don't get the benefits of resting, and have to pay 1 Faith per hour.
You can simultaneously supervise an amount of creatures equal to 1/3 your CHA.
2 hourly Faith, +2 divine bonus to natural health regeneration instead.
3 hourly Faith, +3 divine bonus to natural health regeneration instead.
